questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of being poor in spirit?

choices.answer: Someone prays every day and offers prayers for others
Someone decides to show off their amazing skills as an athlete
A person gives up free time in order to volunteer
A family works to ensure that God is part of their daily lives

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of being comforted while mourning?

choices.answer: The Lord providing for those who are in despair, now and in the future
A person loses a family member, but is reunited with them in the afterlife
A person decides to forget about the people they have lost
A family loses a child, but is reunited with them in the afterlife

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of being meek?

choices.answer: A person shows their strength in a physical manner
One individual feeding a homeless individual
Groups of people anonymously leave clothing for a clothes drive
A person humbles themself before God in prayer

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of hungering and thirsting for righteousness?

choices.answer: Volunteers peacefully march against an unjust law
Going to places devastated by natural disasters in order to help
A student stands up for someone who is being bullied or teased
Letting people get away with bad actions and not correcting them

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of being merciful?

choices.answer: Remembering how someone hurt you so that it doesn't happen again
A life spared at the last minute by a merciful leader
Anytime someone truly forgives another
A student who forgives one who hurt them at school

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of being pure of heart?

choices.answer: An individual reads the Bible and opens their heart to God
A person does a good deed without expecting a reward in return
Children play together with no bias or prejudice
Sitting at a lunch table with your friends and not inviting others

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of being a peacemaker?

choices.answer: Leaders of world countries work towards bringing about peace
Three old friends hold on to their grudges
Two old friends decide to let go of a grudge
Family members who haven't spoken for years reunite with each other

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of being persecuted for righteousness' sake?

choices.answer: Someone is mocked for standing up for someone else
Christians hold strong to their beliefs, despite being persecuted
Staying quiet when someone needs your help
A person states that they are a Christian, despite knowing consequences
